document_data.name: Serpent Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Serpent Bay''' was nestled between the two southern peninsulas of the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region in [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: Roughly rectangular in shape, Serpent Bay was naturally sheltered from the harsh weather of the [[Crowded Sea]], making it an ideal spot for mariners to moor were it not for the terrors lurking beneath the water's surface.
document_data.Description: The waters of Serpent Bay shone with azure color thanks to its shallow basin.
document_data.Inhabitants: True to its name, Serpent Bay was home to countless [[serpent]]s, [[sahuagin]] and other ocean terrors.
